title: Rock Bar at AYANA Jimbaran (Half-day)
overview: Experience Bali's iconic Rock Bar at AYANA with dramatic oceanfront views, cocktails, and sunset sessions in Jimbaran.

stops.description: Depart for Rock Bar at AYANA, Jimbaran.
Arrive and enjoy cocktails with panoramic ocean views.
Experience the famous sunset session with live DJs and signature drinks.

title: Rock Bar at AYANA Jimbaran Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of luxury, oceanfront lounging, and sunset sessions at Rock Bar, AYANA, Jimbaran.

stops.description: Depart for Rock Bar at AYANA, Jimbaran.
Arrive and enjoy the bar, ocean views, and club facilities.
Relax by the bar, enjoy club amenities, or stroll the cliffs.
Experience the famous sunset session with live DJs and signature drinks.
